physical_appearance:This is a tunic blouse. It is black
 with a red fabric panel along the shoulders and down the front of the blouse. The blouse features embroided geometric and floral pattern. It is short sleeved with a shallow scalloped collar.

sgcool_label_text:Exceptional example of an embroidered tunic from the Saiyed Muslim communities of west Kutch.
